attributes.action: Do not cut funding for cancer treatment
attributes.background: I was diagnosed in april 2014 with stage 3 large b cell non hodgson lymphoma .during my fight I've met some amazing people also fighting different cancer's all ages and all stages. I'm asking everyone to sign this so the government rethink cutting the funding for cancer treatment  .

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107548

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
